plot: A Nationalist plot to destroy public utilities in the City of Binghai during the celebrations of the establishment of the People's Republic is thwarted.
title: Dou sha
plot_es: A Nationalist plot to destroy public utilities in the City of Binghai during the celebrations of the establishment of the People's Republic is thwarted.
plot_en: A Nationalist plot to destroy public utilities in the City of Binghai during the celebrations of the establishment of the People's Republic is thwarted.
